context: Electric utility company evaluating carbon capture technology for coal-fired power plant

request.purpose: Install carbon capture and storage system at 500MW coal plant, enabling continued operation with 90% CO2 reduction
request.justification: Compliance with emerging carbon regulations, extended plant life, transition pathway to clean energy

decision_process.outcome: Multiple viable carbon capture technologies identified
Strong regulatory support with tax credits available

business_impact.expected_outcome: Extended plant operation, regulatory compliance, reduced carbon emissions
business_impact.projected_value: $45M in annual savings from incentives and extended life

lessons_learned: Government incentives critical for economic viability, early regulatory engagement essential
